value.name: Body camera video shows moments leading up to deadly police shooting at Phoenix home
value.description: Phoenix police say the suspect and the homeowner didn’t know each other. The suspect, identified as 29-year-old Anthony Greco, was pronounced dead at the scene following the shooting.
